page.title: 04HARDLEY SCHOOL
page.content:
In the 4th and 5th year the students follow courses which lead to public examinations at the end of the 5th year. There are 6 option blocks and students choose 1 subject from each block.
Block 1 Science Chem/Phys/biol/ComSci. 2 Humanities 3 Foreign Language 4 Practical Subjects 5 The final two blocks are 6 mixture of subjects allowing pupils to do extra sciences or an extra language etc.
Apart from this all students do Maths and English compulsory core subjects. The emphasis is to give all pupils a balanced education and to stop specialisation too early.
